messages.title: A record of delivery...
messages.content: A record of action. A promise of more.
It's so close! The Conservatives just 30 votes will tip the Lib Dems into first place in Winchester.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are committed to balance the books and secure the recovery.
The Lib Dems will pay down Britain's debt.
The Lib Dems will commit an extra £8 billion of NHS spending.
The Lib Dems will protect the education budget, ring-fence it from nursery to 19, and ensure no young person goes without a place at college.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives just 30 votes will tip the Lib Dems into first place in Winchester.

issues.education: The Lib Dems will protect the education budget, ring-fence it from nursery to 19, and ensure no young person goes without a place at college.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will commit an extra £8 billion of NHS spending.

politicalExperience.achievements: Jackie's intensive fight on maternity goes on.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems will commit an extra £8 billion of NHS spending.
The Lib Dems will protect the education budget, ring-fence it from nursery to 19, and ensure no young person goes without a place at college.
